change.description: Replaced shell-dependent && chaining in test:all with npm-run-all (run-s) for deterministic, cross-platform execution.
change.script_before: npm run test:unit && npm run test:governance && npm run test:sessions

reason: Eliminate shell semantic drift (PowerShell 5.1 incompatibility) and enforce deterministic, fail-fast orchestration governed by repository configuration.
integrity_assertion: Test execution order is deterministic and shell-agnostic.
